inclusion.criterion: histological or cytological evidence of NSCLC
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Nonresectable Stage II or III NSCLC
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: The tumor is located in the T-L spine, unresectable anaplastic astrocytoma s/p radiation.

inclusion.criterion: KPS is greater than or equal to 70
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Age is greater than or equal to 18 or less than or equal to 80
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ANC count (segs & bands) is greater than or equal to 2000/mm3 and platelet count is greater than or equal to 100,000/mm3
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine less than or equal to 1.5 mg/dL
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin is less than or equal to 1.5 times the institutional upper limits of normal value, SGOT less than or equal to 1.5 times the the institutional upper limit of normal.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients may not be entered on investigational therapeutic trials
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient may have prior chemotherapy. Chemotherapy must have been completed 4 weeks prior to study entry.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: The patient initially presented with RLE weakness where his right knee gave out with difficulty walking and right anterior thigh numbness.

inclusion.criterion: Patients taking cardio-protective dose of aspirin 81 mg are allowed.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient is on high-dose steroids, hypertension, and chronic pain treatment.

exclusion.criterion: History of poorly controlled hypertension (systolic >150 mm Hg), angina, or other cardiac abnormalities or history of MI or CHF in the last 6 months.
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has high-dose steroids and hypertension.

exclusion.criterion: General medical or psychological conditions which would not permit the patient to complete the study or sign the informed consent.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or women of child bearing potential who do not use an effective (for them) method of birth control throughout their participation in this study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are currently receiving or have received amifostine for radioprotection within the prior six months are excluded.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient with history of malignancy other than skin cancer or Carcinoma in-situ within 2 years.
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: The patient has anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine.

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are allergic to Sulfonamides, NSAIDS or Celebrex will be excluded from this protocol.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who use routine NSAIDS such as high dose daily use of Aspirin higher than 2 Gm per day will be excluded. Patients will be allowed to take low dose aspirin (less than 200 mg per day).
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient is on high-dose steroids and hypertension treatment.

exclusion.criterion: History of cardiovascular diseases that might include one of the following: myocardial infarction, angina, coronary angioplasty, congestive heart failure, stroke, or coronary bypass surgery in the last 6 months.
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has high-dose steroids and hypertension.

notes: The patient's history of anaplastic astrocytoma and current treatment with high-dose steroids and hypertension raises concerns about eligibility. Further evaluation is needed to determine the patient's overall health status and ability to participate in the study.
